I wish the teacher could group us randomly instead of choosing our teammates by ourselves because a good friend doesn't mean a good teammate. Some technical problems are due to a sudden change in the website so it shouldn't impact grades.
雖然每個禮拜上課前都很緊張，但上完都會覺得收穫滿滿！只要有認真付出做好每一份作業，一定會感受到滿滿的進步
作業量多且要求較為嚴格，但真的能學到許多關於口說的技巧
